description: This salad features juicy prawns paired with crunchy fennel and a zingy fresh citrus salad dressing making it the perfect flavour sensation.
name: Prawn & Fennel Salad With Basil Citrus Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze the juice of the orange and lime into a small food processor, add the shallot and basil and pulse briefly. With the motor running, slowly add the oil in a thin stream to make a smooth dressing, then season.
Arrange the remaining ingredients on serving plates. Drizzle over the dressing and serve.
